name: Army War Truck Parking: Battle Field Driver
name_original: Army War Truck Parking: Battle Field Driver
description:
Are you ready to handle the most difficult Army Heavy Duty Trucks and Vehicles in war battle field situations? Accept the most difficult army heavy duty automobiles driving missions to transport the most advance army weapons and artillery between the different army bases where the soldiers are waiting for your support to defeat the enemy troops. This game will challenge and amaze you at the same time. Become an army heavy duty truck driver in Army War Truck Parking: Battle Field Driver.
In this game you need to transport cargo filled with things that are necessary for the war areas, and military use. It’s your duty to relieve your brothers fighting for your country and provide them with things that they need.
Playing Army War Truck Parking: Battle Field Driver you could be assigned to transport army guns, tanks, heavy machinery, and army vehicles to the army base or their checkpoints. There are different landscapes like hilly areas, mountains and places that need more attention while driving, so be aware while you are operating the steering wheel, because, you are driving a heavy truck and any mistake could lead damage to your things, and you surely don't want that. In Army War Truck Parking: Battle Field Driver you have to complete the mission assigned to you, stay attentive, because the areas you will travel to are very sensitive, there can be dangerous curves in high mountains, or complex roads leading to places you have never seen. After each level of game, the track will be long, more complex and difficult.

Game features:
- Best VTV driving simulator game
- Different HD camera views during driving
- Multiple Real Life Army Heavy Duty Vehicles & Automobiles
- Real 3D Graphs and Environment
- Addictive driving and parking levels
